fact_check_explanation_title: Why are more people using food banks?
fact_check_explanation_summary: In 2005/06, fewer than 3,000 food supplies were provided by the Trussell Trust. In 2016/17 the number of parcels handed out was almost 1.2 million.

fact_check_explanation_title: UK foreign aid, and an airport that never took off
fact_check_explanation_summary: About £285 million was indeed spent on a project to design, build and operate an airport on the island of St Helena for ten years.

fact_check_explanation_title: Is the UK still the fastest growing G7 economy?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Germany and the UK both grew at the same rate in 2016, according to the latest data available. It may yet be revised.
